skilllist.skilldesc:
Lunox is twisted by the powers of Chaos and Order.
When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Order</font>, she gains 0.5% of Spell Vamp for every 1% of <font color="7f62fe">Magic Penetration</font>. 
When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font>, she gains 0.5% of <font color="7f62fe">Magic Penetration</font> for every 1% of Spell Vamp.

Lunox summons a rain of starlight upon nearby enemies, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+110% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. The starlight then returns to Lunox, each restoring 75<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to her. The HP restored is doubled when hitting enemy heroes.

Grants one stack of <font color="a6aafb">Power of Order</font> after use.

Lunox unleashes Chaos Energy at an enemy, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 2.5% of the target's Max HP (1.5% of Max HP against Creeps).

Grants one stack of <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font> after use.

When Lunox uses the power of Order and Chaos, she will deal 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the targets along the way and slow them by 40% for 2s.

Lunox is twisted by the powers of Chaos and Order.

When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Order</font>, she gains <font color="a6aafb">Brilliance</font> and becomes invincible while dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies. 

When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font>, she gains <font color="a6aafb">Darkening</font> and can blink in a target direction and greatly reduces the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Chaos Assault</font> for a brief period.

Lunox is twisted by the powers of Chaos and Order.
When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Order</font>, she gains 0.5% of Spell Vamp for every 1% of <font color="7f62fe">Magic Penetration</font>. 
When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font>, she gains 0.5% of <font color="7f62fe">Magic Penetration</font> for every 1% of Spell Vamp.

Lunox summons a rain of starlight upon nearby enemies, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+110% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. The starlight then returns to Lunox, each restoring 75<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to her. The HP restored is doubled when hitting enemy heroes.

Grants one stack of <font color="a6aafb">Power of Order</font> after use.

Lunox unleashes Chaos Energy at an enemy, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 2.5% of the target's Max HP (1.5% of Max HP against Creeps). This is unaffected by CD Reduction.

Grants one stack of <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font> after use.

When Lunox uses the power of Order and Chaos, she will deal 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the targets along the way and slow them by 40% for 2s.

Lunox extends the Light Barrier, becomes invincible for 2.5s, and gains 30% extra Movement Speed while dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.5s to nearby enemies.

Lunox is twisted by the powers of Chaos and Order.
When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Order</font>, she gains 0.5% of Spell Vamp for every 1% of <font color="7f62fe">Magic Penetration</font>. 
When Lunox uses <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font>, she gains 0.5% of <font color="7f62fe">Magic Penetration</font> for every 1% of Spell Vamp.

Lunox summons a rain of starlight upon nearby enemies, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+110% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. The starlight then returns to Lunox, each restoring 75<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to her. The HP restored is doubled when hitting enemy heroes.

Grants one stack of <font color="a6aafb">Power of Order</font> after use.

Lunox unleashes Chaos Energy at an enemy, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 2.5% of the target's Max HP (1.5% of Max HP against Creeps).

Grants one stack of <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font> after use.

When Lunox uses the power of Order and Chaos, she will deal 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the targets along the way and slow them by 40% for 2s.

Lunox blinks in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, slowing them by 30% for 4s.

For the next 4s, Lunox enhances her <font color="a6aafb">Power of Chaos</font> to greatly reduce the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Chaos Assault</font> (unaffected by CD Reduction).

data.name: Lunox

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Farm early game for massive DPS late game.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Hybrid Lifesteal
+70 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: Anti-Hero
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A miraculous creature born in Twilight Orb.

assist.desc: Lunox is best paired with heroes with strong CC abilities like Franco and Minotaur. While Lunox lacks hard CC, if she can spam her skills on a stationary target, she can deal a ton of damage.

strong.desc: Lunox counters heroes that lack burst damage and healing, such as Yve and Lylia, because Lunox can use her self-healing to get the upper hand in a trade.

weak.desc: Lunox is countered by heroes with high mobility since her 2nd Skill has limited range and she lacks CC. Nimble heroes like Nolan and Ling can get in and out of her range all too easily.
